title: Tips for coming to London for the first time!
body: Hi guys! I am visiting London for the first time next week (I am from the US), and wondering if there are any great tips you have? Places to see/not to see etc.
replies: Hey, London is great this time of year. I recommend going to the Tower of London and there are also some great cafes near there.
Ignore that guy ^^, you will have a great time, stay at a hostel to meet lots of new people!
Another typical American abroad..., you won't get shot here atleast

title: Places to eat
body: Hi guys, where are some great places to eat in London?
replies: We literally have a thread for that, can you not read??
